Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Bz/Cy selectivity: 216 (1:1 v/v liquid mixture), 723 (1:10 v/v), 1027 (1:20 v/v); Bz removal >99% from Cy with trace Bz (1000 ppm).

Other Information.Additional Info: β-Zn-Ade-TCPE showed similar separation performance but lower adsorption capacities due to blocked pores by coordinated DMA molecules.
